title: So you're in denial about being a furry.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Once per day, make someone a furry in denial. From now on for the rest of the day, they must make their messages in furry speak (https://lingojam.com/FurryTalk)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will naturally make your visitors and your target for tonight's visitors in denial.

fields.name: Side note:
fields.value: Once everyone in denial, the host must send all messages in furry speak because haha funi

desc:
Post 2535
*Denial is but the first step on the road to enlightenment.*
